meta.ip: This the third letter we have that was written by Yohan, one of the twelve interns who spent the most time with Yeshua.

This letter was sent to one of Yohan's friends named Gaius. Yohan praises Gaius for the way he'd looked after other believers and for his living out God's truth. Yohan also warns Gaius about a person named Diotrephes who was opposing the believers.

rem: This is still a very early look into the unfinished text of the
of the Bible. Please double-check the text in advance before using in public.

contents: This letter is from Yohan the elder¦155473 to my dear friend Gaius¦155474 who I love
follow the truth¦155481.
contents.verseText: This letter is from Yohan the elder¦155473 to my dear friend Gaius¦155474 who I love because we both follow the truth¦155481.

contents: My dear friend, I trust that you are healthy¦155489 and doing well in everything just as you are also doing well spiritually.
contents.verseText: My dear friend, I trust that you are healthy¦155489 and doing well in everything just as you are also doing well spiritually.

contents: I was very happy when some of our
brothers¦155499 came and told us about your¦155503 faithfulness to the truth and how you are living it out.
contents.verseText: I was very happy when some of our spiritual brothers¦155499 came and told us about your¦155503 faithfulness to the truth and how you are living it out.

contents: Nothing makes me more happy than hearing¦155520 that other believers that I've helped are living out the truth¦155526.
contents.verseText: Nothing makes me more happy than hearing¦155520 that other believers that I've helped are living out the truth¦155526.

contents: My dear friend, you are faithful¦155529 in what you do for other believers¦155536. Even strangers¦155541
contents.verseText: My dear friend, you are faithful¦155529 in what you do for other believers¦155536. Even strangers¦155541

contents: have told the assembly¦155548 about your¦155544 caring for them before¦155547 sending them on. Your¦155544 actions will be praised by

contents: because¦155559 they¦155565 went¦155565 out to serve God, not getting any help from the unbelievers.
contents.verseText: because¦155559 they¦155565 went¦155565 out to serve God, not getting any help from the unbelievers.

contents: We should be supporting¦155575 believers like them so that we may also become¦155581 their workmates in sharing the truth¦155585.
contents.verseText: We should be supporting¦155575 believers like them so that we may also become¦155581 their workmates in sharing the truth¦155585.

contents: I wrote¦155586 something¦155588 to the assembly¦155590, but Diotrephes¦155595 won't listen to us—he always wants the limelight for himself.
contents.verseText: I wrote¦155586 something¦155588 to the assembly¦155590, but Diotrephes¦155595 won't listen to us—he always wants the limelight for himself.

contents: Because¦155599 of that, if I do end up coming, I will be reminding¦155604 him about what he's been doing¦155609—rambling¦155612 on against¦155612 us with evil¦155611 talks, and then, not being¦155617 happy with that, he doesn't accept other believers¦155624 and expels them from the assembly¦155633 then forbids¦155629 others from accepting¦155622 them either.
contents.verseText: Because¦155599 of that, if I do end up coming, I will be reminding¦155604 him about what he's been doing¦155609—rambling¦155612 on against¦155612 us with evil¦155611 talks, and then, not being¦155617 happy with that, he doesn't accept other believers¦155624 and expels them from the assembly¦155633 then forbids¦155629 others from accepting¦155622 them either.

contents: My dear friend, don't¦155636 copy the evil things
, just the good things. Anyone who does what is good belongs to God—anyone who does evil things has not seen¦155653 God.
contents.verseText: My dear friend, don't¦155636 copy the evil things that others do, just the good things. Anyone who does what is good belongs to God—anyone who does evil things has not seen¦155653 God.

contents: Demetrius¦155656 has been talked about by everyone and even the truth¦155667 itself¦155662 speaks. We have also spoken about him, and you¦155674 know that what we¦155669 say is true.
contents.verseText: Demetrius¦155656 has been talked about by everyone and even the truth¦155667 itself¦155662 speaks. We have also spoken about him, and you¦155674 know that what we¦155669 say is true.

contents: I had many things I wanted to write¦155687 about, but¦155689 won't do it by means of ink¦155694 and¦155695 pen¦155696,
contents.verseText: I had many things I wanted to write¦155687 about, but¦155689 won't do it by means of ink¦155694 and¦155695 pen¦155696,

contents: but¦155702 instead I hope to see¦155706 you¦155705 soon and¦155707 then we¦155712 can speak¦155712 face to face.

contents: Wishing all peace and happiness for you.
friends here also greet you. Please greet
friends there by name.
contents.verseText: Wishing all peace and happiness for you. Your friends here also greet you. Please greet our friends there by name.
